languages.text: В тот день Абеляр оказался рядом с ней. Он мог отступить, но до последней секунды оставался подле Идиры, пытаясь удержать ее разум от коллапса. После инцидента его тело так и не было найдено.

Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.
languages.original_text: В тот день Абеляр оказался рядом с ней. Он мог отступить, но до последней секунды оставался подле Идиры, пытаясь удержать ее разум от коллапса. После инцидента его тело так и не было найдено.

traits.locale_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. They never found his body after the incident.

Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. They never found his body after the incident.

Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

languages.text: 那天，阿贝拉德来到了伊迪拉身边。他本可以一走了之，但他却一直守在她身边，努力不让她的精神崩溃，直到最后一刻为止。事故发生之后，他的遗体一直都没能找到。
languages.original_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

traits.locale_text: 那天，阿贝拉德来到了伊迪拉身边。他本可以一走了之，但他却一直守在她身边，努力不让她的精神崩溃，直到最后一刻为止。事故发生之后，他的遗体一直都没能找到。

languages.text: その日、アベラルドは自分が彼女の隣に居たことに気づいた。去ることもできたが、イディラの精神が崩壊してしまわないよう、最後の瞬間まで彼女の側に留まった。その事故の後、彼の死体は発見されなかった。
languages.original_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

traits.locale_text: その日、アベラルドは自分が彼女の隣に居たことに気づいた。去ることもできたが、イディラの精神が崩壊してしまわないよう、最後の瞬間まで彼女の側に留まった。その事故の後、彼の死体は発見されなかった。

languages.text: Abélard se trouvait à ses côtés ce jour-là. Il aurait pu s'en aller, mais il demeura auprès d'Idira jusqu'à la dernière seconde, faisant tout pour empêcher son esprit de s'effondrer. On ne retrouva jamais son corps après l'incident.
languages.original_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

traits.locale_text: Abélard se trouvait à ses côtés ce jour-là. Il aurait pu s'en aller, mais il demeura auprès d'Idira jusqu'à la dernière seconde, faisant tout pour empêcher son esprit de s'effondrer. On ne retrouva jamais son corps après l'incident.

languages.text: Ese día, Abelard se encontró a su lado. Podría haberse marchado, pero decidió permanecer junto a Idira hasta el último segundo, tratando de evitar que su mente colapsara. Después del incidente, fue imposible encontrar su cuerpo.
languages.original_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

traits.locale_text: Ese día, Abelard se encontró a su lado. Podría haberse marchado, pero decidió permanecer junto a Idira hasta el último segundo, tratando de evitar que su mente colapsara. Después del incidente, fue imposible encontrar su cuerpo.

languages.text: Abelard war an diesem Tag an ihrer Seite. Er hätte weggehen können, blieb aber bis zur letzten Sekunde bei Idira, damit ihr Geist nicht zusammenbrach. Seine Leiche wurde nach diesem Vorfall nie gefunden.
languages.original_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

traits.locale_text: Abelard war an diesem Tag an ihrer Seite. Er hätte weggehen können, blieb aber bis zur letzten Sekunde bei Idira, damit ihr Geist nicht zusammenbrach. Seine Leiche wurde nach diesem Vorfall nie gefunden.

languages.text: Abelard, o gün kendini İdira'nın yanında buldu. Uzak durabilecek olsa da son anına kadar İdira'nın yanında kalıp zihninin çöküşünü engellemeye çalıştı. O günkü olaydan sonra Abelard'ın cesedi asla bulunamadı.
languages.original_text: Abelard found himself at her side that day. He could have walked away, but he stayed by Idira's side until the last second, trying to keep her mind from collapsing. His body was never found after the incident.

traits.locale_text: Abelard o gün kendini İdira'nın yanında buldu. Dönüp uzaklaşabilirdi ancak son saniyeye kadar onun yanında kaldı ve zihninin çökmesini engellemeye çalıştı. Yaşanan olay sonrası Abelard'ın bedeni asla bulunamadı.
